headline: BLUE M CLEAN ROOM OVEN 250ºC
description: Clean Room Oven Class 100 Designed especially for curing of polymide coatings, moisture drying, and baking of photo resist coatings.
categories.lvl2: Heating & Cooling  >  Ovens > Clean Room Ovens
specstable:
Manufacturer Blue M
Model CRO7-256 B/C
Maximum Temperature 250 ºC (482 ºF, 523 ºK)
Minimum Temperature 50 ºC (122 ºF, 323.00 ºK)
Clean Room Class Class 100
Temperature Control
Repeatablility ± 0.500 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Analog Setpoint
Overtemperature Protection YES
Controller Manufacturer/Model Blue M Touchmaster
Number of Control Zones 1
External Cooling Water Cooled
Capacity/Volume Box 4.90 cu ft (0.14 cu m)
Chamber Size
Width 21.50 in (54.61 cm)
Depth 20.00 in (50.80 cm)
Height 20.00 in (50.80 cm)
Chamber Characteristics
Chamber Construction Stainless steel - 304
Accessories Shelves shown in photos may not be available. Please inquire about availability.
Other Information
  • Suitable for inert gas purge (adjustable inert gas flowmeter)
  • Easily removed Class 100 HEPA filter(used)
  • Horizontal air flow
  • Heating elements are high-temp nickel chromium wire
  • Multi-blade centrifugal blower with matched helical scroll
Power Requirements 208/240 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
